Create a new user calledÂ john. Grant him access to the cluster. John should have permission toÂ create, list, get, update and delete podsÂ in theÂ developmentÂ namespace . The private key exists in the location:Â /root/CKA/john.keyÂ and csr atÂ /root/CKA/john.csr.

Important Note: As of kubernetes 1.19, the CertificateSigningRequest object expects aÂ signerName.Please refer the documentation to see an example. The documentation tab is available at the top right of terminal.
